description: This file defines a reusable Flutter widget named InputField, which wraps around the TextFormField widget to provide a minimalist, customizable input field with consistent decoration options, including label, hint, obscurity, keyboard type, suffix icon, validation, read-only mode, and tap handling.

classes.name: InputField
classes.description: A stateless widget that encapsulates a TextFormField with configurable properties for flexible input handling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget subtree, returning a TextFormField configured with the provided parameters.
